core:messageResource.core:message: HHT Sign On
HHT Sign On - Enactor
User ID
Password
User {enactor.signOn.UserId} is not recognised or the password entered is not valid.
The password entered was not valid.
The new password is invalid.
The new password must contain at least on letter and number.
The new password must contain upper and lower case characters.
The new password must be {0} characters long.
The user account for this ID has been disabled.
An application error has occurred. Please contact your administrator.
Too many sign on attempts. Please wait.....
User {enactor.signOn.UserId} is already signed on.
Too many attempts. Your user account has been disabled.
You are not allowed to sign on at this time.
You must sign on by swiping or scanning your user card.
You are currently signed on at another location. Please logout there first before retrying.
Your sign on attempt failed. Please contact your administrator if the problem persists.
You must enter a valid user ID.
The password was not changed
User ID entered is not valid at this location.
Change Password
The user can change their password
Skip PIN with Short ID
The user can login with their short ID without requiring their PIN
Sign on in User Location Only
User can only sign on in the user location
